Class AIFoe

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameObject

  • public class AIFoe
extends GameObject
    Class which describes properties of an intelligent foe.
    Author:
    Patryk Przekwas

    • Method Detail

      • getBounds

        public java.awt.Rectangle getBounds()
        Method returns borders of our object. Used later to detect collisions using intersection.
        Specified by:
        getBounds in class GameObject
        Returns:
        bounds

      • logic

        public void logic()
        Method constantly counts our coordinates and velocity. It's done to follow our main character. Pythagorean theorem is used to count distance and than velocity is set proportional to the distance of the main character.
        Specified by:
        logic in class GameObject

      • render

        public void render(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Method renders our AI foe.
        Specified by:
        render in class GameObject
